codexes.name: Accelerating Aspect
codexes.description: Critical Strikes with Core Skills increase your Attack Speed by + [10-30%] for 5 seconds.

codexes.name: Aphotic Aspect
codexes.description: Skeletal Priests empower your Skeletal Warriors' attacks to deal Shadow Damage and have a [5-25%] chance to Stun enemies for 1.5 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Abundant Energy
codexes.description: Crackling Energy has a [35-55%] chance to deal x40% increased damage and chain to an additional enemy.

codexes.name: Aspect of Accursed Touch
codexes.description:
Lucky Hit: Up to a [20-40%] chance for your Skills to inflict Vampiric Curse on enemies. Enemies afflicted with Vampiric Curse are also Vulnerable.

Vampiric Curse's stored souls deal x [20-60%] increased damage.

codexes.name: Aspect of Adaptability
codexes.description: Basic Skills generate 5 additional Primary Resource, once per Skill. Basic Skills deal x [0.4-0.6%] increased damage for each point of Primary Resource you have.

codexes.name: Aspect of Alacrity
codexes.description: Your Defensive Skills Cooldown [10-70%] faster while moving.

codexes.name: Aspect of Ancestral Charge
codexes.description: Charge calls forth 4 Ancients who also Charge, dealing x [20-40%] of normal damage. Your Summoning Skills deal x [20-40%] increased damage.

codexes.name: Aspect of Ancestral Echoes
codexes.description:
Lucky Hit: Damaging enemies with Leap, Upheaval, or Whirlwind have up to a [45-65%] chance to summon an Ancient to perform the same Skill. Can only occur once every 5 seconds.

Your Summoning Skills deal x [20-40%] increased damage.

codexes.name: Aspect of Ancestral Force
codexes.description: Hammer of the Ancients quakes outward for x [30-60%] increased damage. This bonus is doubled against Bosses.

codexes.name: Aspect of Ancient Flame
codexes.description: While both bonuses from Esu's Ferocity Key Passive are active, your Attack Speed is increased by + [35-55%] .

codexes.name: Aspect of Anemia
codexes.description: Lucky Hit: Damaging Bleeding or Vulnerable enemies has a [15-35%] chance to Stun them for 2 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Anger Management
codexes.description: While above [55-40] Fury, you are Berserk, but 2 Fury Drains per second.

codexes.name: Aspect of Anticline Burst
codexes.description: Stone Burst deals [15-35%] increased damage is guaranteed to Overpower when it detonates at Maximum size.

codexes.name: Aspect of Apogeic Furor
codexes.description: Casting an Ultimate Skill increases your Ultimate damage by x [6-10%] , up to x [60-100%] . At 10 stacks, your Cooldowns and this bonus are reset.

codexes.name: Aspect of Apprehension
codexes.description: Once an enemy is Slowed by at least 80%, they also become Feared for 3 seconds. You deal x [25-40%] increased damage to Feared enemies.

codexes.name: Aspect of Armageddon
codexes.description: A hail of Meteorites fall during Inferno dealing [X] Fire damage on impact. Your Meteorites Immobilize enemies for 3 seconds. While Inferno is active, your Meteorites deal x [200-360%] increased damage.

codexes.name: Aspect of Arrow Storms
codexes.description:
Lucky Hit: Your Marksman and Cutthroat Skills have up to a 25% chance to create an Arrow Storm at the enemy's location, dealing Physical damage over 3 seconds.

Your Arrow Storms deal x [45-65%] increased damage.

codexes.name: Aspect of Artful Initiative
codexes.description:
When you spend 75 Energy you release a cluster of exploding Stun Grenades that deal [X] total Physical damage and Stun enemies for 1 second.

Your Stun Grenades deal x [25-45%] increased damage.

codexes.name: Aspect of Assistance
codexes.description: Your Reinforcement Cooldown is reduced by [22-33%] . After casting your Ultimate Skill, call your Mercenary for Reinforcement.

codexes.name: Aspect of Audacity
codexes.description: When there are at least 5 Close enemies, Stun them for [2.5-4.5] seconds. Can only occur once every 20 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Avoidance
codexes.description: Whenever an enemy hits you, your Dodge Chance against that enemy increases by [6-10%] . Successfully Dodging resets this bonus.

codexes.name: Aspect of Berserk Fury
codexes.description: You gain [1-8] Fury per second while Berserking.

codexes.name: Aspect of Berserk Ripping
codexes.description: Dealing direct damage while Berserking inflicts [15-35%] of the Base damage as additional Bleeding damage over 5 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Binding Embers
codexes.description: Flame Shield grants you unhindered for its duration. Enemies you move through while Flame Shield is active are Immobilized for [1.5-3.5] seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Binding Morass
codexes.description: Close enemies or those you deal indirect damage to are Slowed by [30-70%] for 3 seconds. You deal x [10-30%] increased damage to Slowed enemies.

codexes.name: Aspect of Biting Cold
codexes.description: When you Freeze an enemy there is a [25-45%] chance to make them Vulnerable for 3 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Branching Volleys
codexes.description: Increase the damage of arrows that ricochet from Barrage from 40% to [50-90%] . Barrage's arrows have a [30-70%] chance to split into 2 arrows whenever they ricochet.

codexes.name: Aspect of Bristling Vengeance
codexes.description: Payback now echoes forward and deals [100-150%] of your Thorns along the way. The final echo is larger and deals double the Thorns damage.

codexes.name: Aspect of Bul-Kathos
codexes.description: Leap creates an Earthquake that deals [X] Physical damage over 4 seconds. While standing in Earthquakes and for 4 seconds afterwards, you gain [10-25%] increased Damage Reduction.

codexes.name: Aspect of Burning Rage
codexes.description: While Berserking, you deal [X] Fire damage every second to surrounding enemies.

codexes.name: Aspect of Bursting Bones
codexes.description: When a segment of Bone Prison is destroyed or expires, it deals [X] damage in an area around itself.

codexes.name: Aspect of Bursting Venoms
codexes.description: Lucky Hit: Poison Imbued Skills have up to a [15-35%] chance to deploy a Poison Trap while you have Poison Trap equipped.

codexes.name: Aspect of Charged Flash
codexes.description: Crackling Energy deals x [40-60%] increased damage. When you have Crackling Energy, Charged Bolts spends a charge to also fire a wave dealing Crackling Energy damage in the area.

codexes.name: Aspect of Combined Strikes
codexes.description: Each different Basic Skill you cast increases all of your damage by x [10-30%] for 10 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Concentration
codexes.description: Casting a Conjuration Skill grants you [15-25%] Damage Reduction for 5 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Concussive Strikes
codexes.description: Your Daze effects last [20-40%] longer. Dazing an enemy increases your Movement Speed by [20-40%] for 3 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Conflagration
codexes.description:
While channeling Incinerate, your Burning damage is increased by x [25-40%] .

Enemies damaged by Incinerate explode, Burning all surrounding enemies for [X] over 6 seconds. Can only occur once every 3 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Contamination
codexes.description: Poison Trap bursts for an additional [10-30%] of its total normal damage when it triggers. If that Critically Strikes, you deal x [20-40%] increased Poison damage for 9 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Control
codexes.description: You deal x [20-35%] more damage to Immobilized, Stunned, or Frozen enemies.

codexes.name: Aspect of Corruption
codexes.description: Your Imbuement Skills have x [40-60%] increased potency.

codexes.name: Aspect of Creeping Death
codexes.description: You deal x [5-20%] increased damage over time to enemies for each different Crowd Control effect they're afflicted by. Unstoppable enemies and Staggered Bosses take x [10-40%] increased damage over time from you instead.

codexes.name: Aspect of Creeping Cadaver
codexes.description: Consuming a Corpse increases your Movement Speed by + [20-40%] for 8 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Cruel Sustenance
codexes.description: Explosions from the Victimize Key Passive grant you a Barrier for [5-15%] of your Maximum Life for 5 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Cyclonic Force
codexes.description: Cyclone Armor also provides Physical Damage Reduction. In addition, Cyclone Armor will be applied to all Nearby Allies.

codexes.name: Aspect of Decay
codexes.description: Each time the Shadowblight Key Passive deals damage to enemies, it increases the next Shadowblight's damage within 10 seconds by x [30-50%] , stacking up to 5 times.

codexes.name: Aspect of Deflection
codexes.description: While active, Counterattack reflects incoming Razor Wings back out again with x [30-50%] increased damage. Other Small Missiles are also deflected back at enemies and deal [30-50%] of Counterattack's Base damage on impact.

codexes.name: Aspect of Delayed Extinction
codexes.description: Mighty Throw and Steel Grasp now gain multiplicative damage instead of cooldown from Cooldown Reduction and their damage is increased by another x [25%] . Additionally, Weapon Mastery skills gain x [15-35%] bonus damage.

codexes.name: Aspect of Disobedience
codexes.description: You gain [0.4-0.8%] increased Armor for 4 seconds when you deal any form of damage, stacking up to [25-40%] .

codexes.name: Aspect of Distilled Anima
codexes.description: While Soulrift is active, you are Unhindered and gain 1% increased Movement Speed per absorbed soul, up to [30-60%] . This lasts for 5 seconds after Soulrift ends.

codexes.name: Aspect of Earthquakes
codexes.description:
Ground Stomp creates an Earthquake that deals [X] Physical damage over 4 seconds. While standing in Earthquakes and for 4 seconds afterwards, you deal x [25-60%] increased damage.

Your Earthquakes deal x [20-60%] increased damage.

codexes.name: Aspect of Efficiency
codexes.description: Casting a Basic Skill reduces the Mana cost of your next Core or Mastery Skill by [35-55%] .

codexes.name: Aspect of Electrified Claws
codexes.description: Shapeshifting into a new animal form causes a Lightning Bolt to strike a Nearby enemy dealing Lightning damage. Your Lightning Bolts deal x [20-40%] increased damage and Stun for 2 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect Of Elemental Acuity
codexes.description: Casting a Pyromancy, Shock, or Frost Skill increases your Mana Regeneration by [10-25%] for 5 seconds, once per Element. At maximum stacks, the total bonus is increased to [60-150%] for 10 seconds, but all stacks expire after the duration.

codexes.name: Aspect of Elemental Constellation
codexes.description: Casting Pyromancy, Shock, or Frost Skills conjures a matching Elemental Dagger around you that pierces through enemies dealing [X] damage after 3 seconds. The damage increases by 100% per matching Elemental Skill you cast.

codexes.name: Aspect of Elements
codexes.description:
Gain x [15-35%] increased damage to a set of damage types for 7 seconds. This effect alternates between 2 sets:
• Fire, Lightning, and Physical.
• Cold, Poison, and Shadow.

codexes.name: Aspect of Elusive Menace
codexes.description: While you have both bonuses from the Close Quarters Combat Key Passive active, your Dodge Chance increases by [4-8%] whenever you're hit by an enemy. Successfully Dodging resets this bonus.

codexes.name: Aspect of Empowered Feathers
codexes.description: Lucky Hit: Eagle Skills have up to a [25-32%] chance to summon a Spirit Feather. You can collect Spirit Feathers to reduce your Mobility Skill Cooldowns by 0.5 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Empowering Reaper
codexes.description: Damaging enemies with Sever has a [15-35%] chance to spawn a pool of Blight under the target that deals x [70-190%] bonus damage. This effect can only happen once every 3 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Encircling Blades
codexes.description: Flurry damages enemies in a circle around you and deals x [35-55%] increased damage.

codexes.name: Aspect of Encroaching Wrath
codexes.description: After spending 100 Fury, your next Weapon Mastery or Brawling Skill within 8 seconds deals x [50-80%] increased damage.

codexes.name: Aspect of Endurance
codexes.description: Your Resolve has a [2-6%] chance to not be lost when you are hit for each stack of Ferocity you have.

codexes.name: Aspect of Engulfing Flames
codexes.description: You deal x9% increased Burning damage to enemies for each second they remain Burning, up to x45% after 5 seconds. Additionally, you deal x [10-30%] increased Burning damage to enemies that are not Healthy.

codexes.name: Aspect of Exhilaration
codexes.description: Lucky Hit: Hitting an enemy has up to a [15-35%] chance to reduce your Evade Cooldown by 5 seconds. Each stack of Ferocity you have increases this chance by 5%.

codexes.name: Aspect of Explosive Mist
codexes.description: Blood Mist triggers Corpse Explosion on surrounding Corpses. When Blood Mist detonates a Corpse, its Cooldown is reduced by [0.1-0.8] seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Explosive Verve
codexes.description: Your Grenade Skills count as Trap Skills. Whenever you arm a Trap or drop Grenades, you gain [10-30%] increased Movement speed for 3 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Exposed Flesh
codexes.description: Lucky Hit: Up to a 10% chance to generate [35-55] Essence when hitting a Vulnerable enemy.

codexes.name: Aspect of Falling Feathers
codexes.description:
Moving with a Mobility Skill or Evade spawns Storm Feathers along behind you.

Storm Feathers now drop from the sky as they are spawned, each dealing [X] Lightning damage on impact.

codexes.name: Aspect of Fel Gluttony
codexes.description:
Your Golem Active also causes your Golem to erupt, dealing [X] Physical damage to surrounding enemies. 
Your Golem consumes Corpses to reduce its remaining Cooldown by 1 second and deals x [20-40%] increased damage.

codexes.name: Aspect of Fevered Mauling
codexes.description: When you hit at least 1 enemy with Maul, increase its Attack Speed by [1-3%] and you gain [1-5%] Damage reduction for 5 seconds, stacking up to 5 times.

codexes.name: Aspect of Fierce Winds
codexes.description:
Your Shout Skills create 3 Dust Devils that deal [X] damage to enemies along their path.
Your Dust Devils are [5-25%] bigger and deal x1% increased damage for each 1% their size is increased.

codexes.name: Aspect of the Flaming Rampage
codexes.description: Charge gains an additional Charge. Each target hit by it explodes for [X] Fire damage to surrounding enemies.

codexes.name: Aspect of Fleet Wings
codexes.description:
Razor Wings is now also an Incarnate Skill with:
Passive: You are Unhindered.
Active: Increase Potency damage by x [3-5%] for each active Razor Wing.

codexes.name: Aspect of Forest Power
codexes.description: Lucky Hit: Up to a 25% chance to create a Mystic Circle for 10 seconds. Casting a Gorilla Skill in Mystic Circles empowers them to periodically grant you a Barrier for 25% of your Maximum Life which increases your Armor and Maximum Resistances by [5-25%] while active.

codexes.name: Aspect of Fortune
codexes.description: Your Lucky Hit Chance is increased by [10-30%] while you have a Barrier active.

codexes.name: Aspect of Forward Momentum
codexes.description: Knocking Back an enemy grants + [25-45%] Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Frenzied Dead
codexes.description: Each time one of your Minions damages an enemy, they gain + [10-18%] Attack Speed for 3 seconds, up to + [30-54%] .

codexes.name: Aspect of Frosty Strides
codexes.description: While below [45-60%] Life, Evade Freezes Close enemies, deals [X] Cold Damage to them, and makes them Vulnerable for 3 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Frozen Memories
codexes.description: The Avalanche Key Passive now reduces the cost of Frost Skills by an additional 30% and its damage to Vulnerable enemies is increased to x [75-100%] .

codexes.name: Aspect of Frozen Orbit
codexes.description: Frozen Orb explodes 2 additional times at its destination for [50-70%] of its damage.

codexes.name: Aspect of Giant Strides
codexes.description: Reduces the Cooldown of Leap by [1.3-3.5] seconds per enemy hit, up to a maximum of 7 seconds. Hitting a Boss with Leap provides the maximum cooldown reduction.

codexes.name: Aspect of Gore Quills
codexes.description: Casting Blood Lance will consume Blood Orbs to also conjure lances from them. Each additional Blood Lance deals [40-80%] of normal damage and prioritizes targeting un-lanced enemies.

codexes.name: Aspect of Grasping Veins
codexes.description: Gain + [5-25%] increased Critical Strike Chance for 6 seconds when you cast Corpse Tendrils. You deal x [10-50%] bonus Critical Strike Damage to enemies damaged by Corpse Tendrils for 6 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Grasping Whirlwind
codexes.description: Whirlwind Pulls enemies to you every [6-3] seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Hardened Bones
codexes.description: You and your Minions gain [10-30%] increased Damage Reduction.

codexes.name: Aspect of Haste
codexes.description: Every second while moving gain + [10-30%] Bonus Movement Speed for 2 seconds, up to + [30-90%] .

codexes.name: Aspect of Herculean Spectacle
codexes.description: Mighty Throw deals x [25-45%] increased damage and hurls another 2 weapons.

codexes.name: Aspect of Hungry Blood
codexes.description: Each cast of Blood Lance will launch an additional Blood Lance at a Nearby enemy when it first hits an enemy that is already lanced, dealing [60-100%] of normal damage.

codexes.name: Aspect of Imitated Imbuement
codexes.description: Your Shadow Clones also mimic the Imbuements applied to your Skills. Casting an Imbuement Skill grants your active Shadow Clone x [5-25%] increased damage for 9 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Incendiary Fissures
codexes.description: Your Earthquakes deal x [40-60%] increased damage and their damage is converted into Fire.

codexes.name: Aspect of Inevitable Fate
codexes.description: When an enemy falls below 35% Life while afflicted with any of your damage over time effects, an explosion occurs every 7 seconds, dealing [X] damage for each Eement they're afflicted by.

codexes.name: Aspect of Infestation
codexes.description: Lucky Hit: Centipede Skills have up to a 35% chance to spawn a Pestilent Swarm from the target which deals [X] Poison damage per hit. Pestilent Swarms now also deal 100% of their Base damage as Poisoning damage over 6 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Inner Calm
codexes.description: Deal x [5-13%] increased damage. Triple this bonus after standing still for 3 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Interdiction
codexes.description: Gain [1-15%] Block Chance per Resolve stack.

codexes.name: Aspect of Impending Deluge
codexes.description: Storm Strike chains to twice as many targets and increases the damage the targets take from other Skills by x [30-50%] for 6 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Invigorating Will
codexes.description: Losing a stack of Resolve has a 25% chance to Heal you for [5-11%] of your Maximum Life.

codexes.name: Aspect of Iron Rain
codexes.description: Smoke Grenade has a 100% chance to create an Arrow Storm where it explodes, dealing [X] Physical damage over 3 seconds. Your Arrow Storms continuously apply Vulnerable.

codexes.name: Aspect of Kinetic Suppression
codexes.description: Casting a Non-Basic Mobility Skill grants [1-8] Resolve and causes your next Concussive Stomp to strike in a circle.

codexes.name: Aspect of Layered Wards
codexes.description: Your Block Reduction is increased by [20-40%] while you have a Barrier.

codexes.name: Aspect of Layered Wards
codexes.description: Your Block Reduction is increased by [10-30%] while you have a Barrier.

codexes.name: Aspect of Lethal Dusk
codexes.description: Evading through an enemy infected by Shadow Imbuement grants Stealth for 4 seconds. Breaking Stealth Heals you for [10-30%] of your Maximum Life.

codexes.name: Aspect of Limitless Rage
codexes.description: Each point of Fury you generate while at Maximum Fury grants your next Core Skill within 5 seconds x [1-3%] increased damage, up to 15 times.

codexes.name: Aspect of Mending Stone
codexes.description: The duration of Earthen Bulwark is increased by 6 seconds. In addition, killing an enemy with a Skill replenishes [X] of your active Earthen Bulwark's Barrier.

codexes.name: Aspect of Metamorphic Stone
codexes.description: Boulder is now a Core Skill and costs 40 Spirit to cast dealing [120-160%] of normal damage.

codexes.name: Aspect of Metamorphosis
codexes.description: When you Evade you turn into a cloud of bats, becoming Unstoppable for 2.5 seconds. Enemies along your path take [X] Physical damage and are inflicted with Vampiric Curse. Evade's Cooldown is increased by [10-4] seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Might
codexes.description: Basic Skills grant 20% Damage Reduction for [2-10] seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Momentum
codexes.description: After you Evade, your next Core Skill dashes to your target and does x [15-35%] increased damage.

codexes.name: Aspect of Natural Balance
codexes.description:
Casting a Storm Skill grants your Earth Skills x [50-70%] Critical Strike Damage for 4 seconds.

Casting an Earth Skill increases the Critical Strike Chance of Storm Skills by + [10-15%] for 4 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Nature's Savagery
codexes.description: Werewolf Skills function as Storm Skills and Werebear Skills function as Earth Skills for the Nature's Fury Key Passive.

codexes.name: Aspect of Nebulous Brews
codexes.description: Healing Potions can be used at full Life and grant [35-55%] Movement Speed for 3 seconds. Every 20 meters you travel refills a Healing Potion.

codexes.name: Aspect of Noxious Ice
codexes.description: Chilled enemies Poisoned by Poison Imbuement will be further Chilled for 20% per second. You deal x [20-40%] additional Poison damage to Frozen enemies.

codexes.name: Aspect of Numbing Wrath
codexes.description: Each point of Fury generated while at Maximum Fury grants [X] Fortify.

codexes.name: Aspect of Occult Dominion
codexes.description: Your maximum number of Skeletal Warriors and Skeletal Mages is increased by 2.

codexes.name: Aspect of Overheating
codexes.description: After channeling Incinerate for 2 seconds it deals x [75-100%] increased damage for 5 seconds. Casting Incinerate refreshes and maintains this bonus.

codexes.name: Aspect of Overwhelming Currents
codexes.description: Unstable Currents has a [25-45%] chance to cast an additional Shock Skill.

codexes.name: Aspect of Perpetual Stomping
codexes.description: Damaging an enemy with Kick or Ground Stomp resets Leap's Cooldown.

codexes.name: Aspect of Pestilence
codexes.description:
Stinger spawns a Pestilence Swarm at its target location which deals [50-90%] of Stinger's Base damage per hit.
Pestilent Swarms now last 50% longer and spiral outwards.

codexes.name: Aspect of Pestilent Points
codexes.description: Every 3rd cast of Puncture is Poison Imbued with [105-165%] of normal potency.

codexes.name: Aspect of Piercing Cold
codexes.description: Ice Shards pierce 5 times and deals x [35-50%] increased damage, and an additional x10% more damage per subsequent enemy hit.

codexes.name: Aspect of Piercing Static
codexes.description: The third time an enemy is hit by a single Cast of Charged Bolts, spawn [3-5] new Charged Bolts.

codexes.name: Aspect of Plains Power
codexes.description: Lucky Hit: Up to a 25% chance to create a Mystic Circle for 10 seconds. Casting a Jaguar Skill in Mystic Circles empowers them to keep your Ferocity at Maximum and increase your damage by [1-2.5%] per stack while you remain within.

codexes.name: Aspect of Plunging Darkness
codexes.description: Bone Prison is now a Darkness Skill and spawns Blight for 6 seconds. Your Blights deal x [40-60%] increased damage while Bone Prison is active.

codexes.name: Aspect of Potent Blood
codexes.description: Blood Orbs grant [10-30] Essence.

codexes.name: Aspect of Potent Exchange
codexes.description: Gain 1 Resolve when you Dodge an attack. Your Potency Skills consume 2 Resolve to deal x [15-55%] increased damage.

codexes.name: Aspect of Quickening Fog
codexes.description: You automatically drop a Smoke Grenade at the end of Dash. Smoke Grenades reduce Dash's cooldown by [0.5-0.7] seconds for each enemy hit, up to [1.50-2.10] seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Quicksand
codexes.description: Damage from Earth Skills Slow enemies hit by [20-60%] for 5 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Rallying Reversal
codexes.description: You have [25-60%] chance to gain 1 Ferocity when you Crowd Control an enemy.

codexes.name: Aspect of Rathma's Chosen
codexes.description: Whenever your Blood Skills Overpower you gain + [35-55%] Attack Speed for 4 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Reactive Armor
codexes.description: Gain 10% Block Chance. Blocking an attack has a [30-70%] chance to cast a free Concussive Stomp at them.

codexes.name: Aspect of Reanimation
codexes.description: Your Minions gain increased damage while alive, up to x [40-60%] after 10 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Recalling Feathers
codexes.description: Casting a Focus Skill recalls Nearby Spirit Feathers which deal [X] Lightning damage to enemies along their way. If there are no Nearby Spirit Feathers, the cast instead spawns 10 randomly around you.

codexes.name: Aspect of Redirected Force
codexes.description: Gain increased Critical Strike Damage equal [30-70%] of your Block Chance. Blocking doubles this bonus for 10 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Redirected Force
codexes.description: Gain increased Critical Strike Damage equal [30-70%] of your Block Chance. Blocking doubles this bonus for 10 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Repeating
codexes.description: Rapid Fire has a [30-50%] chance to ricochet to another target.

codexes.name: Aspect of Retaliation
codexes.description: Your Core Skills deal up to x [35-75%] increased damage based on your amount of Fortify.

codexes.name: Aspect of Retribution
codexes.description:
Distant enemies have a 10% chance to be Stunned for 2 seconds when they hit you.

You deal x [15-35%] increased damage to Stunned and Knocked Down enemies.

codexes.name: Aspect of Searing Wards
codexes.description: Firewall slows enemies within by 60%. After spending [125-65] Mana your next Firewall is free to cast, destroys incoming Small Missiles, and Immobilizes anything hit with the initial Cast for 3 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Serration
codexes.description: The Ossified Essence Key Passive also increases the Critical Strike Damage of your Bone Skills by x1% per Essence above 50, up to x [25-45%] .

codexes.name: Aspect of Service and Sacrifice
codexes.description: Skeleton Warriors explode on death, dealing [X] Physical damage to surrounding enemies. They lose 25% Life per second while in combat. Skeleton Mages take 90% reduced damage and deal x [50-100%] increased damage.

codexes.name: Aspect of Shared Misery
codexes.description: Lucky Hit: When you hit a Crowd Controlled enemy, there is up to a [35-55%] chance for that Crowd Control effect to spread to another unaffected enemy.

codexes.name: Aspect of Shattered Defenses

codexesPTR.description: Heal for [1-21%] Maximum Life when you Poison a Healthy enemy.

codexesPTR.name: Rapid Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Basic Skills gain + [15-35%] Attack Speed.

codexesPTR.name: Ravager's Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Shadow Step has an additional Charge and gains a charge when it kills an enemy. Casting Shadow Step increases its damage by x [9-18%] for 5 seconds, up to x [45 -90%] .

codexesPTR.name: Ravenous Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Killing a Vulnerable enemy grants you x [55-75%] increased Energy Regeneration for 4 seconds.

codexesPTR.name: Raw Might Aspect
codexesPTR.description: After you hit 15 enemies with your Shapeshifting Skills, your next Werebear Skill will deal x [40-60%] more damage and Stun enemies for 3 seconds.

codexesPTR.name: Reaper's Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Enemies you Poison have 100% Reduced Healing and your Eagle Skills gain + [10-30%] increased Critical Strike Chance against them.

codexesPTR.name: Reaping Lotus' Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Sever no longer returns and instead splits into 3 specters that expand out and back from its apex. Sever deals [180-240%] of normal damage.

codexesPTR.name: Rebounding Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Quill Volley's feathers explode at their apex and return to where they were cast, dealing [50-70%] of their normal damage both times.

codexesPTR.name: Recharging Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Each time Chain Lightning bounces, gain [2.5-5] Mana.

codexesPTR.name: Rejuvenating Aspect
codexesPTR.description: When falling below 20 Spirit, there is a [15-30%] chance to fully restore your Spirit.

codexesPTR.name: Relentless Berserker's Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Lucky Hit: Damaging an enemy with a Core Skill has up to a [15-35%] chance to extend the duration of Berserking by 2 second. Double this duration if it was a Critical Strike.

codexesPTR.name: Requiem Aspect
codexesPTR.description: You gain [2-10] Maximum Essence per active Minion.

codexesPTR.name: Resistant Assailant's Aspect
codexesPTR.description:
Casting Concealment grants 10% Resistance and Maximum Resistance to all elements for 6 seconds.

Killing an Elite enemy reduces Concealment's cooldown by [6-14] seconds.

codexesPTR.name: Rip and Tear Aspect
codexesPTR.description:
Rushing Claw deals x [10-30%] increased damage and is empowered based on how many Charges it has when you Cast it:
1: Heals for 15% of your Maximum Life.
2: Guaranteed to Overpower.
3: Guaranteed to Critically Strike.
4+: Strikes an additional time.

codexesPTR.name: Rotting Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Decompose can chain and burst up to 4 additional targets. Explosions from Decompose deals x [15-35%] increased damage.

codexesPTR.name: Runeworker's Conduit Aspect
codexesPTR.description:
Critical Strikes with Storm Skills cause Lightning Bolts to periodically strike close enemies for 3 seconds, each dealing [X] Lightning damage.

Your Lightning Bolts deal x [25-40%] increased damage.

codexesPTR.name: Ruthless Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Your Critical Strike Chance with Jaguar Skills is increased against enemies by + [1-11%] for each 10% of their missing Life. Jaguar Skills gain 15% Critical Strike Chance.

codexesPTR.name: Sacrificial Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Your Sacrifice bonuses are increased by x [35-55%] .

codexesPTR.name: Seismic-shift Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Earth Spike deals x [50-70%] increased damage and launches 2 rows of spikes in a line.

codexesPTR.name: Serpentine Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Hydras deals x [0.3-0.5%] increased damage per Mana you had when Summoned. Casting Hydra Consumes all of your Mana.

codexesPTR.name: Shademist Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Your Minions deal [X] Corrupting damage per second to enemies around them. The damage over time lasts for [2-5] seconds after leaving the aura.

codexesPTR.name: Shadowslicer Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Dash spawns a Shadow Clone that also casts Dash, dealing [150-350%] of the Base damage.

codexesPTR.name: Shattered Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Explosions from the Shatter Key Passive deal x [30-50%] increased damage.

codexesPTR.name: Shattered Spirit's Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Casting Bone Spirit also launches 18 Bone Splinters in all directions, dealing x [200-600%] increased damage and generating 6 Essence per enemy hit.

codexesPTR.name: Shepherd's Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Companion Skills deal an additional [5-13%] damage per Companion you have.

codexesPTR.name: Shivering Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Enemies take up to x [35-55%] increased damage based on how much Chill or Stagger they have built up. You apply 15% more Chill.

codexesPTR.name: Shockwave Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Pulverize creates a shockwave that travels forward, dealing [80-120%] of its damage to targets in the path.

codexesPTR.name: Skinwalker's Aspect
codexesPTR.description: When you use a Shapeshifting Skill that changes your form, Fortify for [2-3%] of your Maximum Life.

codexesPTR.name: Skullbreaker's Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Stunning a Bleeding enemy deals [25-45%] of their total Bleeding amount to them as Physical damage.

codexesPTR.name: Slice and Dice Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Twisting Blades' initial hit cleaves. Twisting Blades return [25-45%] faster.

codexesPTR.name: Slaking Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Lucky Hit: You have up to a [45-65%] chance to gain 20 Fury when a Core Skill deals direct damage to at least one Bleeding enemy. Your Maximum Fury is increased by [5-25] .

codexesPTR.name: Smiting Aspect
codexesPTR.description: You have + [13-23%] increased Critical Strike Chance against Injured enemies. While you are Healthy, you gain + [25-45%] increased Crowd Control Duration.

codexesPTR.name: Snap Frozen Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Each Chilled or Frozen enemy you Evade through grants you a Barrier that absorbs [X] damage for 5 seconds, absorbing up to a maximum of [X] damage.

codexesPTR.name: Snowguard's Aspect
codexesPTR.description: While within your own Blizzard and for 3 seconds after leaving it, you take [15-35%] less damage.

codexesPTR.name: Snowveiled Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Ice Armor makes you Unstoppable and grants [200-400] Armor.

codexesPTR.name: Spirit Bond Aspect
codexesPTR.description: [10-17.5%] of the damage you would take is redirected across your Companions. In addition, your Companions cannot die.

codexesPTR.name: Splintering Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Bone Spear's primary attack makes enemies hit beyond the first Vulnerable for 3 seconds. Bone Shards from Bone Spear deal [30-70%] bonus damage to Vulnerable enemies and pierce them.

codexesPTR.name: Stable Aspect
codexesPTR.description: While Unstable Currents is not active, your Shock Skills have a [6.5-17%] chance to trigger a free cast from it.

codexesPTR.name: Starlight Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Gain [25-45] Primary Resource for every 20% Life that you Heal or every 120% Life that you Overheal when at Maximum Life.

codexesPTR.name: Starving Ravager's Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Ravager no longer has a duration and instead drains [14-4] Vigor every second until depleted. Effects that extend Ravager instead generate Vigor.

codexesPTR.name: Steadfast Berserker's Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Gain [0.1-0.3%] Max Life Fortify whenever you deal direct damage while Berserking.

codexesPTR.name: Sticker-thought Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Gain [X] Thorns while Channeling and for 3 seconds afterwards.

codexesPTR.name: Storm Swell Aspect
codexesPTR.description: You deal x [15-35%] increased damage while Ice Armor is active. This amount is increased by another 15% against Frozen enemies.

codexesPTR.name: Stormchaser's Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Tornado drags non-Elite enemies and deals x [20-40%] increased damage. Each enemy or object inside of the Tornado increases the damage by an additional x [10%] .

codexesPTR.name: Stormclaw's Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Critical Strikes with Shred deal [40-60%] of the damage dealt as Lightning damage to the target and surrounding enemies.

codexesPTR.name: Stormcrow's Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Ravens now deal Lightning damage which is increased by x [60-100%] . Ravens Active deals its full damage in half the time, and enemies inside it are Stunned.

codexesPTR.name: Stormshifter's Aspect
codexesPTR.description: While Hurricane is active, gain +5 Ranks to your Shapeshifting Skills.

codexesPTR.name: Subterranean Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Poison Creeper's active also casts Landslide in a circle around you. Earth Skills deal x [15-35%] increased damage to Poisoned enemies.

codexesPTR.name: Symbiotic Aspect
codexesPTR.description: When the Nature's Fury Key Passive triggers a free Skill, your non Ultimate Cooldowns of the opposite type are reduced by [2.5-6] seconds.

codexesPTR.name: Tidal Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Blood Wave fires 2 additional waves, each dealing [40-100%] of normal damage, but you can no longer recast it until the last wave ends.

codexesPTR.name: Tormentor's Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Enemies who move while Poisoned by you additionally take [50-250%] of your Thorns damage per second.

codexesPTR.name: Torturous Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Iron Maiden is now also a Darkness Skill and deals Shadow damage. Enemies have a [10-30%] chance to be Stunned for 1 second when they take damage from Iron Maiden.

codexesPTR.name: Toxic Alchemist's Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Lucky Hit: Shadow Imbued Skills have up to a 75% chance to create a toxic explosion that applies [X] Poisoning damage over 5 seconds to the target and surrounding enemies. If they were already Poisoned, increase this damage by x100%.

codexesPTR.name: Trickshot Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Whenever Penetrating Shot damages an enemy, 2 additional arrows split off to either side. These side arrows deal [10-30%] of Penetrating Shot's Base damage and do not split.

codexesPTR.name: Trickster's Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Caltrops, Smoke Grenade, and Death Trap receive your Stun Grenade benefits and throw Stun Grenades that deal [X] Physical damage and Stun enemies for 1 second. Your Stun Grenades deal x [25-45%] increased damage.

codexesPTR.name: Umbrous Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Lucky Hit: Critical Strikes have up to a [45-65%] chance to grant a free Dark Shroud shadow.

codexesPTR.name: Undying Aspect
codexesPTR.description: When you cast a Skill, you heal for [0.5-2.5%] Life. Double this bonus while below 50% Life.

codexesPTR.name: Unrelenting Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Every 3rd Crushing Hand smashes an additional 10 times around you for x [40-80%] of its damage.

codexesPTR.name: Unyielding Commander's Aspect
codexesPTR.description: While Army of the Dead is active, gain x [70-110%] Summoning Damage and your Minions take 90% reduced damage.

codexesPTR.name: Vehement Brawler's Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Casting an Ultimate Skill increases your damage by [10-30%] for 8 seconds. Gain 2 additional Ultimate Skill Ranks.

codexesPTR.name: Vengeful Aspect
codexesPTR.description:
Lucky Hit: Damaging a Vulnerable enemy has a 25% chance to create an Arrow Storm at the enemy's location, dealing [X] Physical damage over 3 seconds.

Your Arrow Storms deal x [45-65%] more damage.

codexesPTR.name: Veteran Brawler's Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Each time a Brawling Skill deals direct damage to an enemy, your Charge, Leap, or Kick deals x [4-10%] increased damage for 5 seconds, up to x [20-50%] .

codexesPTR.name: Vigorous Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Gain [7.5-17.5%] Damage Reduction while Shapeshifted into a Werewolf.

codexesPTR.name: Virulent Aspect
codexesPTR.description: When Rabies infects an enemy, reduce its Cooldown by [0.2-0.99] seconds, tripled when infecting Elite enemies. You deal x [25-50%] increased damage to enemies affected by Rabies.

codexesPTR.name: Wanton Rupture Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Double your Rupture's skewer radius, and all Bleed durations are increased by[ 30-60%] .

codexesPTR.name: Weapon Master's Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Your Weapon Mastery Skills have an additional Charge. Lucky Hit: Damaging an enemy with a Weapon Mastery Skill has up to a [40-60%] chance to Stun them for 2 seconds.

codexesPTR.name: Wildbolt Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Every [3.5-2] seconds, Distant enemies are Pulled in to you and take 10% increased damage for 3 seconds.

codexesPTR.name: Wind Striker Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Critical Strikes grant [8.5-19%] Movement Speed for 1 second, up to 6 seconds.

codexesPTR.name: Windlasher Aspect
codexesPTR.description: Casting Double Swing creates a Dust Devil that deals [X] damage to enemies in its path.

codexesPTR.name: Winter Touch Aspect
codexesPTR.description: When you Freeze an enemy, you deal [X] Cold damage to them. This effect is treated as a Frost Skill.
